resources.string: Mark all as read\nThe \'New Message\' icon will be removed for all current chats.
Mark all as unread\nUnread chats will appear in bold with a \'New Message\' icon.
Star this chat\nChats that are starred will not be removed after 1 day of inactivity.
Mark this chat as read\nThe \'New Message\' icon will be removed.
Mark this chat as unread\nUnread chats will appear in bold with a \'New Message\' icon.
Un-star this chat\nChats that are not starred will be removed after 1 day of inactivity.
This app requires a valid version of Google Play Services.
There was an error connecting to Google Play Services.
There was an error logging into the Chat Service.
Location services are unavailable or turned off.
Please wait while your location is being determined.
Unable to send your message, please try again later.
Speech to text is not supported on this device.
Unable to start your email app.
Approximate location determined by Wi-Fi or mobile networks is required.
LIVE CHAT WITH FELLOW COMMERCIAL DRIVERS IN YOUR AREA.\nIT\'S LIKE HAVING A DIGITAL CB AT NO COST.
Totally FREE app, no hidden fees.\nPlease support our Sponsors.

I am using TruckChat right now, check it out at:

http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.teletype.truckchat

http://truckchatapp.com

This app is provided as a free service for trucking professionals.

We want the commercial truck driving community to have a pleasant and useful experience using the free TruckChat app, so that means no posting of explicit or offensive content. More specifically: no porn, no racism, no homophobia, no threats, no abuse, no bullying, no profanity, no sexual advances, no solicitation or personal services. No advertising of your business (unless you are a paying Sponsor of the app with written permission from the developer).

If we feel you are violating these terms, we can remove your content and/or delete your profile without question. We encourage checking with drivers about weather, traffic, parking, company reviews, delivery discussions between drivers and dispatchers."
By pressing the \"I Agree\" button you agree to these terms."
Prepend your messages with a handle\n(Handles are not unique for each user).
Plays a sound for incoming and outgoing messages.
Sounds are silenced for incoming and outgoing messages.
Notifications are shown for new messages when the app is not running.
Notification messages will play the following ringtone:\n%s
Notification messages will not play any sounds.
Notification messages will play the default system alarm sound.
Notification messages will play the default system notification sound.
Notification messages will play the default system ringtone.
Notification messages will vibrate the device.
Notification messages will not vibrate the device.
Allowing access to this device\'s coarse location is required for location based chats to function correctly.

You have previously selected the checkbox to "Never ask again" for allowing access to this device's location.

If this was done in error, please tap Retry to open the App Info screen and go into the Permissions section to enable the Location permission.

Location based chat will not function correctly if allowing access to this device's location is not granted.
